unnormalised: PayTM-achem noveach falttak lagun netizen hankam hanso ailo! Distta, tanchem "instant cashback" offer teo dakhoita tech promann *thoddo* instant naslo. Users aplya chai ani samosachea ordersacher (total bill: ₹150, approx.) teo godd, godd Rs. 50 off gheunche khatir Bollywood lagna poros lagin vetolea vella report kortat.
normalised: PayTM-achem noveen gaffe netizen-ank hasounk laita! Disun yeta, tanchi "instant cashback" offer zata asli legit instant naxil'li. Users-ank je sweeth, sweet rupee fifty off snagh korunk tanchi chai ani samosa orders-ancher (total bill: rupee one hundred and fifty, approximately) te report kortat waiting times Bollywood wedding-an poros lamb.

unnormalised: Distta tech promann, zann "5-second cashback" uttor dilam teo "5-business day cashback" zalea, zaka lagun hasyeache memes ani tweets yetat. Ek user majheken mhontat, "Maje pounte chole hea samosak sampo korche adim cashback melltele. Hanv azun Rs. 20 khatir vatt polloitam!". PayTM-acho stock price? Sodyak Rs. 850 okolo ghumtalo. Tech karnn zait?
normalised: Apparently, promised "five-second cashback" ek "five-business day cashback" vorim zata, jenna hilarious memes ani tweets zatat. Ek user joke marta, "Mhaje great-grandchildren kadachit cashback mellounk xaktat mhaka poros poilim mhonn hanv samosa finish korun. Azun rupee twenty-ak wait korta jem mhaka promise kel'lem!". PayTM-achem stock price? Currently rupee eight hundred and fifty aspas hovering korta. Kiteak hem reason asunk xakta?

unnormalised: PayTM-an sangilam teanchea serviceak "unprecedented demand" asa mhunn. Unprecedented, ki kashi unexpected slow? Amka dhoop asa ki tancho customer support rag bhorelea customeranchea ₹50 parat magun tanne zorr kelam. Hea ratean, tankam 'delayed cashback' cashback offer korchi podteli, zanchi keemat asat ₹100, shanti rakhchek khatir!
normalised: PayTM-an ek statement issue kelam te mhonntat tankam "unprecedented demand" asa tanchi services-ak. Unprecedented, vo surprisingly slow? Ami guessing kortam tanchi customer support hammered zatolem angry customers daddun tanchi rupee fifty portun magon. At this rate, tankam kadachit offer korunk poddteli 'delayed cashback' cashback of, say, rupee one hundred, just to keep the peace!
